chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has the following issue.
Thanks,

Hello ecomobile,    

The customer has expressed his wish to cancel the order 40622424.    

Please stop the shipment and proceed with the refund.    

If the parcel has already been dispatched, please contact the carrier directly and ask them to stop the delivery and return the parcel to your warehouse. This will allow you to retrieve the product more quickly.    

We look forward to hearing from you.    

Anthonio, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will contact our logistics partner to inform them of the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
